title: Council Decision of 2 July 1999 concerning the appointment of the Special Representative of the European Union to act as Coordinator of the Stability Pact for South-Eastern Europe
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 2 July 1999
concerning the appointment of the Special Representative of the European Union to act as Coordinator of the Stability Pact for South-Eastern Europe
(1999/434/CFSP)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: The Council will adopt as soon as possible a Joint Action confirming the appointment and the mandate and indicating the duration, means (in particular diplomatic, material and financial), procedures and conditions concerning the implementation of the Special Representative's mandate.

Only expenses for travel and accommodation, incurred by the EU Special Representative during the period from appointment until the adoption of the joint action referred to in Article 2, will be covered in accordance with the rules applicable to the General Budget of the European Union.

This Decision shall take effect on the date of its adoption.
The appointment will expire on 31 July 1999, unless confirmed by the joint action to be adopted in accordance with Article 2.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 July 1999.
For the Council
The President
T. HALONEN
